# append(_:)

**Instance Method**

Adds an element to the end of the collection.

## Declaration

```swift
mutating func append(_ newElement: LowLevelMesh.PartsCollection.Element)
```

## Parameters

- **newElement**: The element to append to the collection.

## Updating collection contents

- **append(contentsOf:)**: Adds the elements of a sequence or collection to the end of this collection.
- **replaceAll(_:)**: Replaces all mesh parts in this collection with those from the new sequence.
- **removeAll()**: Removes all mesh parts from this collection.
